categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Golden Lichen Tuile was a type of delicate tuile made using dust from the Golden Lichen found on the planet Batuu. At some point after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs included a recipe for Golden Lichen Tuile in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which also used them as an ingredient in Nectrose Freeze. He called the recipe's yield "lichen flakes."

Tuggs described the Golden Lichen Tuiles as the best tuiles he had ever made and made sure to fill his pantries with Golden Lichen dust whenever he visited Batuu in order to ensure he could continue supplying his customers with the tuiles. The chef usually saved tuiles to use as an embellishments for his fancier dishes if he wanted to add some crunch, but also occasionally ate an entire batch himself in one sitting.

Golden Lichen Tuiles were created as a recipe for the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, written by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. The out-of-universe recipe for the tuiles requires butter, sugar, ground turmeric, ground ginger, and all-purpose flour.
